elements.title: open source tool for smart tariffs
elements.description: Vital Energi are leading a consortium of experts to drive innovation in the development and support of smart tariffs. The tool will be open source, [funded by BEIS](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/smart-meter-enabled-tariffs-comparison-project-smarter-tariffs-smarter-comparisons) Jul 2020

elements.title: Smart Export Guarantee tariffs
elements.description: Smart Export Guarantee (SEG) tariffs have been unveiled after the legislation came into full effect yesterday (1 January 2020), with pricing ranging wildly
